Jx.Field.Textarea

Extends: Jx.Field

This class represents a textarea field.

These fields are rendered as below.

<div id='' class=''>
   <label for=''>A label for the field</label>
   <textarea id='' name='' rows='' cols=''>
     value/ext
   </textarea>
</div>

Example

Summary
Jx.Field.TextareaExtends: Jx.Field
Options
rowsthe number of rows to show
columnsthe number of columns to show
templatethe template used to render this field
Functions
